article_title: Google Working With City of Los Angeles CIO on High-Speed Fiber Network
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Los Angeles Chief Information Officer Ted Ross says he’s working with Alphabet Inc.'s Google on laying the groundwork for a high-speed fiber-optic network.  “We’re arguably the content creation capital of the world and things like video require a lot of bandwidth,” Mr. Ross tells CIO Journal.
twitter.title: Google Working With City of Los Angeles CIO on High-Speed Fiber Network
